description: Fortran program for computing second virial coefficients for atom-diatom or diatom-diatom systems. As provided computes interaction virial coefficients for hydrogen-carbon monoxide mixtures based on 1998 potential energy surface of Jankowski and Szalewicz. Computes classical part, first and second order radial quantum corrections, and first order angular quantum corrections.
title: Virial6: a Fortran program for virial coefficient calculations
